com.github.fge.jsonschema.keyword.common

Class AdditionalPropertiesKeywordValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.fge.jsonschema.keyword.KeywordValidator
      • com.github.fge.jsonschema.keyword.common.AdditionalPropertiesKeywordValidator

  • public final class AdditionalPropertiesKeywordValidator
extends KeywordValidator
    Validator for additionalProperties

    Note that this keyword only handles validation at the instance level: it does not validate children.

    The rules are:

    • if additionalProperties is a schema or true, validation succeeds;
    • if it is false, then validation succeeds if and only if all instance members are either members in properties or match at least one regex of patternProperties.
